Signature by X Mark or Thumbprint
Accept signatures by
X
mark or thumbprint
only
if any one of the following individuals (or group of individuals) witness the mark or thumbprint:
two persons who give their addresses
a VA employee
a VSO representative
an attorney
an accredited agent
a notary public, or
a person having the authority to administer oaths for general purposes.
